Text:
GREAT Tunes!  Thx for the uploads.  But you are killing me with these individual torrents.  I love them all.  Put them in a BIG torrent!

Thanks for the upload!!

@beowoulfe
Good idea.. why not do it yourself? Put them all together & upload them in 1 big torrent (not that big really). At best you will be doing the community a service, at worst, you will learn the hard way why I do it the way I do.  =)
Well, I might do that.  Once I get them all down.  As long as it's OK with you.
I wouldn't suggest it if it wasn't alright with me.. fill yer boots.  =)
